name: Seshu Sai
about: I am a Full Stack Developer with 2 years of experience in developing web applications. I have a strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and MongoDB. I am passionate about learning new technologies and building new projects.

projects.name: Movierulz API
projects.description: An unofficial API for Movierulz website

projects.name: TrackMyAttendance
projects.description: This website allows users to securely enter their credentials and retrieve their attendance data via an open-source API. User credentials are stored locally in the browser's local storage, enabling a seamless experience on subsequent visits where they can directly view their attendance without re-entering their details.

projects.name: Flames Calculator
projects.description: Explore the captivating FLAMES algorithm through our interactive website, crafted with HTML, CSS, and Python scripts.

projects.name: Mdisk Desktop
projects.description: A desktop application for Mdisk streaming service
